## ðŸ›  Development

### Pre-requirements

- [git](https://git-scm.com)
- [nvm](https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm)

### Install node

```bash
nvm install
```

### Install pnpm

```bash
corepack enable pnpm
```

### Install dependencies

```bash
pnpm install
```

### Running dev server

```bash
pnpm dev
```

### Build

```bash
pnpm build
```

### Preview builded

```bash
pnpm preview
```
